title: CardioStent-X Post-Market Registry (CARDIO-REG)
key_endpoints: 12-month MACE rate; TLR at 12 months; definite/probable stent thrombosis
interim_results: 12-month MACE rate: 6.2% (n=980 evaluable); TLR: 3.1%; definite/probable ST: 0.4%. Results consistent with pre-market clinical data and state-of-the-art.

title: Systematic literature surveillance for coronary DES safety
key_endpoints: Identification of new safety signals or performance concerns from published literature
interim_results: 12 publications screened; 10 included; no new safety signals identified. Findings consistent with known risk profile.

title: Continuous complaint rate monitoring and trending
key_endpoints: Monthly complaint rate monitoring against UCL; Western Electric rule surveillance
interim_results: No trend detected in 2023 surveillance period. All monthly rates within control limits. Mean rate: consistent with historical baseline.
next_milestone: Continuous monitoring; next formal review in PSUR-2024
